entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow or freezing rain beginning this morning then changing to rain mixed with snow this afternoon. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind northeast 50 km/h becoming northwest 20 this morning then northeast 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:28 AM NST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow changing to flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 07:28 AM NST Tuesday 07 March 2023
